description: Object containing the details about self-employment expenses.

consolidatedExpenses.description: The sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfGoodsAllowable.description: Cost of goods bought for resale or goods used. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

paymentsToSubcontractorsAllowable.description: Payments to construction Industry subcontractors. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

wagesAndStaffCostsAllowable.description: Wages, salaries and other staff costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

carVanTravelExpensesAllowable.description: Car, van and travel expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

premisesRunningCostsAllowable.description: Rent, rates, power and insurance costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

maintenanceCostsAllowable.description: Repairs and renewals of property and equipment. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

adminCostsAllowable.description: Phone, fax, stationery and other office costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

businessEntertainmentCostsAllowable.description: Business entertainment costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

advertisingCostsAllowable.description: Advertising costs. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

interestOnBankOtherLoansAllowable.description: Interest on bank and other loans. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financeChargesAllowable.description: Bank, credit card and other financial charges. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

irrecoverableDebtsAllowable.description: Irrecoverable debts written off. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFeesAllowable.description: Accountancy, legal and other professional fees. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

depreciationAllowable.description: Depreciation and loss/profit on sales of assets. Expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherExpensesAllowable.description: Other business expenses associated with the running of the business. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
